text: John I (1267 â€“ 31 January 1330) was the count of Namur from 1305 to 1330. He was a member of the House of Dampierre, the son of Guy of Dampierre, Count of Flanders and Marquis of Namur, and his second wife Isabelle of Luxembourg. Category:1267 births Category:1330 deaths Category:Counts of Namur
title: John I, Marquis of Namur
